title: 3783个二字词的心理语言学常模(AoA,Familiarity等)

title: 19716个词的习得年龄评分常模(AoA)

title: 11310个词的情绪效价与唤醒度评分常模(Valence,Arousal)

title: 词汇具体程度评分常模(Concreteness)(model-generated ratings)

title: 1200个二字词的心理语言学常模(Valence,Arousal等)
description: Liu, J., Fan, L., Zhang, X., & Xu, Z. (2025). Affective and Psycholinguistic Norms for 1200 Two‐character Chinese Words. International Journal of Applied Linguistics.

title: 4030个词的情感常模(Valence,Arousal等)

title: 8105个汉字和假字的词汇决策时间常模(Reaction Time)

title: SUBTLEX-CH汉字频率常模(Frequency)

title: SUBTLEX-CH词汇频率常模(Frequency)
description: Cai, Q., & Brysbaert, M. (2010). SUBTLEX-CH: Chinese word and character frequencies based on film subtitles. PloS one, 5(6), e10729.

title: MELD-SCH词汇具体程度评分常模(Concreteness)

title: 大规模汉语词汇联想(Word Association)

title: 1100个词的较多指标常模(Valence,Arousal等)

title: 汉字的不同意义(Meaning)

title: 汉语词汇感知觉模态常模(Visual/auditory strength等)
